channel.title: discography on Shintaro Tanaka
channel.description: Recent content in discography on Shintaro Tanaka

item.title: Gathered Petals
item.description: “Gathered Petals” is my first piano solo album. I composed plain short pieces, which were compared to flower petals, instead of magnificent styles of maestros. Also I played a piano not like a confident virtuoso but as a naive child touching keyboards for the first time. Through these concept, I had been pursuing the music of origin, and the origin of music. All music composed and performed by Shintaro Tanaka Mixed and Mastered by Daisuke Fukuda (a.

item.title: つきのふね / The Moon Boat Sails
item.description: 都会の夜景を見下ろすよりも、静かに夜空を見上げていたい。 このアルバムの主題は、月や星といった手の届かない場所にあるもの。 In the nighttime, I’d rather look up the stars than look down over cities. The theme of this cd is things unreachable in our life such as the moon and stars. I always love those things far away. 林灰二（劇団「Oi-SCALE」主催）
